message.body: Hey so I passed the police academy fitness exam! I forgot that I never told you
Oh my god I was going to call you today when I was on my lunch break to ask you what happened about the police test as I didn't hear anything from you.
I knew you would pass it, dumped behind!

Lol yea it occurred to me around lunchtime that I never updated you. But that was hard, I never want to have to do that again! Next step is an intensive background investigation, psychological evaluation, and polygraph exam
I go dec 8th for the psych eval and lie test.
You'll fail the lie and psych test.
Ahahaha I know right. Im a nervous wreck over it
